reviewText: This is for Region 2 (Japan)only and not playable in US/CA. There are also no subtitles. All this information is clearly indicated on the back of the package and the seller had to have known it. The omition of this information had to be willful. While Amazon.com cannot be always responsible for information submitted by others they can should some of it when they chose to sell items themselves and made it impossible to be contacted for further product information prior to it being sold. All other sellers can be contacted except,in this case,Amazon.com itself.
